from comet.agent.nlu.nlu import NLU
from typing import List
import warnings
from comet.lib import logger
from comet.agent.core.state import DialogueState
from comet.agent.core.action import DialogueAct
from comet.utilities import constants

warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

_logger = logger.get_logger(__name__)
PRJ_DIR = constants.WORKING_DIR



[docs]class DenverNLU(NLU):
    def __init__(self, **kwargs):
        super(DenverNLU, self).__init__(**kwargs)
        self.pre_sys_mentions = []

    def _check_args_sanity(self, **kwargs):
        if 'ontology' not in kwargs:
            raise AttributeError(f'{self.__class__.__name__}: Please provide ontology!')
